name: Ghxst (Ghost)
description:
Ghxst (Ghost) is a VR videogame created by Dynovision Games, team composed by Marc Molina, Anna Vidal and Toni Ferrari.

Summary

In the game, you become the last standing and living samurai. Your mission is simple, as your guardian Kyubi  will dictate to you, you have to defeat Ashura, a demon that awakened the souls of the dead and conquered the Spirit Realm. 

Grab your Katana and prepare for a fun VR samurai experience!

Mechanics

Use your katana to slice whatever you can.

Grab pots, jars, etc. 

Heal yourself with Red potions, remove the cap and throw its content to your head and enjoy the refreshing sense of healing!

THE GAME IS OPTIMIZED FOR OCULUS RIFT!
